TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
If you could change my name to “Noah Foloni” please? If so that would be great.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-08-09T16:48:41Z" title="08/09/2022 04:48  PM" data-short="1 yr">August 9, 2022</time> by DaBakonAder**

...and mine to Piatzin

Please and thank you.

> 
> 
> 14 hours ago, furnace3dgaming said:
> 
> 
> Hello can you change my name to JxEq pls
> 

Okay. 

> 
> 
> 7 hours ago, Earthlinger said:
> 
> 
> ...and mine to Piatzin
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Please and thank you.
> 

> 
> 
> 10 hours ago, Noah Foloni said:
> 
> 
> If you could change my name to “Noah Foloni” please? If so that would be great.
> 

Okay.
ah.....I feel a new man!

At last, I have arrived.

First on the list for my name change request was the title of "**Ono Shinos Madiq Steiny**," though after reviewing the forum guidelines that name is rather, eh, no.

So, I respectfully request that my username be changed to "**Forum Guidelines."**

Would this be possible? Thank you!

> 
> 
> 19 minutes ago, dumpster diver said:
> 
> 
> "**Forum Guidelines."**
> 

Sadly no.

Skirts too close too 2.2k in the actual [Forum Guidelines](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/guidelines/)
I don't want my name to be changed.

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, ShuttlePilot said:
> 
> 
> I don't want my name to be changed.
> 

Are you sure? I did it myself and it was fantastic! 10/10 would recommend. Absolutely worth it, no side-effects aside from some mild confusion and dizziness, light headache here and there, occasional late-night crisis involving nausea and what I can only describe as neural misfiring, but really, excluding that it's absolutely painless and immediate! Not convinced? Why don't you sleep on it? Listen, I can give you a brochure I got handed...lemme see where I put it...
